text: Daivasahayam Lucky Centre is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, produced by T.V.Gopalakrishnan, directed by Rajan Chevayoor, starring Risabava and Sreeja in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Sreeja as Shalini * Risabava as Anil * Jagathy Sreekumar as Thankappan Pilla * Mala Aravindan as Vaasu * Mamukkoya as Usmanikka * Bobby Kottarakkara as Daamu * Sandha Devi as Anil'a mother * Kunjadi as Sekharan Music director Kannoor Raj Singers K.S. Chithra, N.Unnikrishnan, Ambili, Sujatha ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Daivasahayam Lucky Centre
